Importance of Direct Action Survivors of disaster, violence, or other traumas often feel out of control. eCourage will help you decide on simple positive actions that can help strengthen your sense of control.
Types of Direct Action eCourage can help you calm your body and mind, get support from others, lift your mood, support others as well as yourself, and move towards wise use of alcohol or drugs.
Your Own Choices eCourage doesn\'t impose any requirements. You set your own goals and choose the means that help you most. We\'re simply here to help!
